mapper.insert: insert into db_antistoprele (SEQUENCEID, OPER, OPERTIME, CORPID, OPENFLAG, ANTISTOP1, ANTISTOP2) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{antistop1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{antistop2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_antistoprele set OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ANTISTOP1 = #{antistop1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, ANTISTOP2 = #{antistop2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, OPER, OPERTIME, CORPID, OPENFLAG, ANTISTOP1, ANTISTOP2 from db_antistoprele
